samples.context: In 1987, the United Nations Environment Programme (UNEP) succeeded in forging an agreement to freeze CFC production at 1986 levels.
samples.question: What agreement did UNEP achieve in 1987?

samples.context: It is now mandatory for countries to avoid further depletion of the ozone layer through monitoring and controlling the use of ozone-depleting substances.
samples.question: What are countries required to do regarding ozone-depleting substances?
